title: TokenMaster can still see people in Pending requests after they were accepted by the Owner

labels.name: E:Desktop Community Admin Improvements
labels.description: Implementation of the needed improvements for the Admin events to be stable.

milestone.description:
**1.  Fix bug and stabilise Communities and Messaging functionality**

**2.  Reduce size of community description metadata**
- better compressions, less duplication

**3. Use data sync layer (or other mechanism) to improve community description reliability**
- Every time a new user joins the community, the Control Node updates and signs the description.
- Random back off to stop it being too chatty 

**4. Continue work on profile showcase **



**--- Wallet Team ---**

1. Complete support for Community minted assets

2. Complete token visibility management screens

3. Continue working on WalletConnect support

4. Minor updates to Asset screens

5. Continue fixing bugs, making optimisations and keeping tech debt low

body:
# Bug Report

## Description

As a TokenMaster, I can see pending requests to join. Once they were accepted by the Onwer, I can see the new members in the `All members` tab, but some of them still appear in the `Pending Requests` tab.

This **might** be because I tried to accept them and it failed. See https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12902
The person still in the list is the one I tried to approve and it failed.

However, I also see myself in the Pending Requests, which makes no sense.

Pending tab:
![image](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/11926403/40042fa6-a234-4438-9a4d-d38b3e0e18b1)

Members tab (see that the two above are also in the members):
![image](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/11926403/8163f247-3db9-4ab4-b4e9-e7ef8b187e0e)


## Steps to reproduce

1. Create an on request community in Account A
2. Invite Account B to community
3. Join using Account B and approve using A
5. A mints the Owner token and airdrops a TM token to B
6. B is now a TM
7. B can see himself in the Pending Requests :exclamation: 
8. C sends a request to join the community
9. B sees the request. Optional step: B tries to accept and it fails
10. A approves the request
11. C is now a member of the community, but the request is still in the pending list :exclamation: 

#### Expected behavior

Once a member is accepted or rejected, he is no longer part of the pending list
We can never see ourselves in the pending list

#### Actual behavior

Sometimes members stays in pending when approved and I could see myself in pending

### Additional Information

Tested in testnet mode

- Status desktop version: 0.15.0 RC5
- Operating System: Ubuntu 20
